content: this is a summary of a legal case in the taurage district court the case involves a matrimonial property dispute between two parties referred to as the applicant gl and the defendant al the applicant is seeking a divorce due to the defendants infidelity and physical abuse the court has granted the applicants request for an equal division of the apartment and common areas the court has also ordered the defendant to pay various fees including stamp duty court fees and secondary legal aid fees the court has approved the grant application and dissolved the marriage allowing the applicant to retain their married name the defendant is responsible for paying the costs of secondary legal aid and procedural document costs to the state

metadata.cost: 332.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 8.96 EUR (court fees) + 315.57 EUR (secondary legal aid fees) to be borne by the defendant
